title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: PBL-Based Educational Design Competency Enhancement for Early Childhood Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational early childhood education theories and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design educational programs by applying the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to real early childhood education scenarios.
Through PBL team activities, learners enhance educational design competencies by collaborating effectively with peer teachers and exchanging feedback.
Learners simulate the educational design process using digital tools (e.g., survey apps, video production) in a constrained technological environment (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
